Title: Withholds the governor's salary until the legislative passage of the budget occurs
Summary: Withholds the governor's salary until the legislative passage of the budget occurs; provides such salary should be withheld if the budget has not passed prior to the first day of the fiscal year and shall not be paid until such passage occurs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to withholding the governor's salary until the legislative passage of the budget occurs
